name: How to God
summary:
What Kind of God Will You Be?

Are you a wise and benevolent leader, or a vengeful deity? Will you assist your villagers, or throw them into the sun?

In How to God, a sandbox God Simulation game, you alone choose how to shape your world. Command your followers, experiment with alchemy, build up your villages, and make the choice between good and evil. No judgement from us, of course - only you can choose How to God.

😈 Choose your creature

Spawn a mighty creature to do your bidding! Train it with...
